entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 8.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5 with temperature rising to 9 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 5 with temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
